definitions.text: put into a proper or systematic order
examples: arrange the books on the shelves in chronological order
Can you arrange a meeting with the President?

definitions.text: plan, organize, and carry out (an event)
examples: the neighboring tribe staged an invasion

definitions.text: set (printed matter) into a specific format
examples: Format this letter so it can be printed out
dress my hair for the wedding

definitions.text: adapt for performance in a different way

examples: I put these memories with those of bygone times
